userdata.title: Entrance
userdata.description:
Click and drag to rotate view
Find icons located around the scene, and click to view info pop-ups, URL links, images, and videos.
To move to the next scene, find the arrow, or choose a category from the bottom menu.

userdata.title: Library
userdata.description: Literacy in all aspects is the key to learning. As our Prophet s.a.w began his journey with Iqra – ‘Read’ as the first revelation of Quran.

userdata.title: Computer Room
userdata.description: Computer skills are essential for our 21st Century learners

userdata.title: Science
userdata.description: Early Muslim scholars established many of the disciplines that our students continue to excel in today

userdata.title: STEM
userdata.description: Collaborative work is an important social skill and essential in developing STEM capacity

userdata.title: Art
userdata.description: Understanding how to create, design and incorporate beauty is part of our Islamic heritage

userdata.title: Downstairs Hallway
userdata.description: Extra curricular activities of all kinds are encouraged at AIC

userdata.title: Wellbeing
userdata.description: Students perform best in safe places with supportive teachers who understand their needs

userdata.title: HASS
userdata.description: Knowing your world and having the confidence to speak about it are skills necessary for leaders of the future

userdata.title: D+T
userdata.description: Discovery is a critical part of learning

userdata.title: Arabic
userdata.description: The study of Arabic is an essential part of understanding the Islamic Religion Knowing you identify means understanding how to be a Muslim in Australian society.

userdata.title: Boys Courtyard
userdata.description: Strength, teamwork, and sports skills make for a healthy body and mind, and balance our academic program

userdata.title: Girls Courtyard
userdata.description: Students learn skills in many sports during the day with extra-curricula sport after school

userdata.title: Hall
userdata.description: Our multipurpose hall ensures that our students have the opportunity to fulfil their spiritual obligations in salat

userdata.title: Playground
userdata.description: From an early age our students are encouraged to develop both their body and mind

userdata.title: Kindergarten
userdata.description: Interest and inspiration help students to begin their journey of learning

userdata.title: Junior Primary
userdata.description: With exciting lessons and supportive caring teachers, AIC students excel

userdata.title: Upper Primary
userdata.description: AIC Recognises that our students are from diverse backgrounds, but also individuals with their own special characteristics
